Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
The UserController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing users.

This controller handles HTTP requests from the frontend and interacts with the service layer to perform CRUD operations on users. It supports user creation, retrieval, and updates.

Passwords are hashed before being stored, and duplicate usernames are prevented at the API level.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public UserDTO createUser(@RequestBody RegisterUserDTO registerUserDTO) throws BadRequestException, NotFoundException
      Creates a new user after verifying uniqueness and encoding the password.
      Parameters:
      registerUserDTO - A RegisterUserDTO containing the new user's credentials and roles.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO representing the newly created user.
      Throws:
      BadRequestException - if the provided data is invalid.
      NotFoundException - if required related entities are missing.
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if a user with the same username already exists.

    • updateUser

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public UserDTO updateUser(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @RequestBody UpdateUserDTO updatedUserDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing user's information by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to update.
      updatedUserDTO - A UpdateUserDTO containing the updated user information.
      Returns:
      The updated UserDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the user does not exist.
      BadRequestException - if the input data is invalid.

    • getUserById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public UserDTO getUserById(@PathVariable("id") Long id) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a single user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A UserDTO representing the user.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the user does not exist.
      BadRequestException - if the provided ID is invalid.

    • getAllUsers

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<UserDTO> getAllUsers() throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a list of all users in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of UserDTO objects representing all users.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no users are found.
      BadRequestException - if a request issue occurs.
